name: Sand Shark Grapple Park!
description:
Use a combination of ground- and movement with a grappling to traverse the Score attack and Time attack levels!

Was a great experience working with the wonderful collaborators!

Collaborators:

Michael Røbekk (https://www.artstation.com/michaelrobekk)
